passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > header:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(6) > div > span:nth-child(1) > span:nth-child(2)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div > div > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
